name: DALL-E Image Generation
description: This is a basic image generation template. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, SecretStrInput, BoolInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from openai import OpenAI

class DallEImageGenerator(Component):
    display_name = "Dall-E Image Generator"
    description = "Generates an image using the OpenAI Dall-E model from a text prompt."
    icon = "image"
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="prompt",
            display_name="Text Prompt",
            info="Enter the text prompt to generate an image.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="model",
            display_name="Model",
            info="Select the DALL-E model version to use.",
            options=["dall-e-2", "dall-e-3"],
            value="dall-e-3"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="quality",
            display_name="Quality",
            info="Select the image generation quality.",
            options=["standard", "hd"],
            value="standard"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="size",
            display_name="Image Size",
            info="Select the output image dimensions.",
            options=["1024x1024", "1024x1792", "1792x1024"],
            value="1024x1024"
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="openai_api_key",
            display_name="OpenAI API Key",
            info="The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.",
            advanced=False,
            value="OPENAI_API_KEY",
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Generated Image", name="generated_image", method="generate_image"),
    ]

    def generate_image(self) -> Message:
        prompt = self.prompt
        openai_api_key = self.openai_api_key
        client = OpenAI(api_key=openai_api_key)

        try:
            response = client.images.generate(
                model=self.model,
                prompt=prompt,
                size=self.size,
                quality=self.quality,
                n=1,
            )
            image_url = response.data[0].url
            self.status = f"Image generated successfully: {image_url}"
            return Message(text=image_url)
        except Exception as e:
            error_message = f"Failed to generate image: {str(e)}"
            self.status = error_message
            return Message(text=error_message)
code.name: code

model.name: model
model.info: Select the DALL-E model version to use.

openai_api_key.name: openai_api_key
openai_api_key.info: The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.

prompt.info: Enter the text prompt to generate an image.

code.value:
from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import BoolInput
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.memory import store_message
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER


class ChatOutput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Output"
    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"
    name = "ChatOutput"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",
            info="Message to be passed as output.",
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="should_store_message",
            display_name="Store Messages",
            info="Store the message in the history.",
            value=True,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="sender",
            display_name="Sender Type",
            options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER],
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_AI,
            advanced=True,
            info="Type of sender.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="sender_name",
            display_name="Sender Name",
            info="Name of the sender.",
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session_id",
            display_name="Session ID",
            info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="data_template",
            display_name="Data Template",
            value="{text}",
            advanced=True,
            info="Template to convert Data to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Data's text key.",
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response"),
    ]

    def message_response(self) -> Message:
        message = Message(
            text=self.input_value,
            sender=self.sender,
            sender_name=self.sender_name,
            session_id=self.session_id,
        )
        if (
            self.session_id
            and isinstance(message, Message)
            and isinstance(message.text, str)
            and self.should_store_message
        ):
            store_message(
                message,
                flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
            )
            self.message.value = message

        self.status = message
        return message
code.name: code

data_template.name: data_template
data_template.info: Template to convert Data to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Data's text key.

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.info: Message to be passed as output.

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.

should_store_message.info: Store the message in the history.

code.value:
from axiestudio.base.data.utils import IMG_FILE_TYPES, TEXT_FILE_TYPES
from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import BoolInput
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, FileInput, MessageTextInput, MultilineInput, Output
from axiestudio.memory import store_message
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"
    name = "ChatInput"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",
            value="",
            info="Message to be passed as input.",
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="should_store_message",
            display_name="Store Messages",
            info="Store the message in the history.",
            value=True,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="sender",
            display_name="Sender Type",
            options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER],
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_USER,
            info="Type of sender.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="sender_name",
            display_name="Sender Name",
            info="Name of the sender.",
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session_id",
            display_name="Session ID",
            info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        FileInput(
            name="files",
            display_name="Files",
            file_types=TEXT_FILE_TYPES + IMG_FILE_TYPES,
            info="Files to be sent with the message.",
            advanced=True,
            is_list=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response"),
    ]

    def message_response(self) -> Message:
        message = Message(
            text=self.input_value,
            sender=self.sender,
            sender_name=self.sender_name,
            session_id=self.session_id,
            files=self.files,
        )

        if (
            self.session_id
            and isinstance(message, Message)
            and isinstance(message.text, str)
            and self.should_store_message
        ):
            store_message(
                message,
                flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
            )
            self.message.value = message

        self.status = message
        return message

input_value.info: Message to be passed as input.

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import BoolInput
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.memory import store_message
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER

    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"
    name = "ChatOutput"

    inputs = [

            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",

from axiestudio.base.data.utils import IMG_FILE_TYPES, TEXT_FILE_TYPES
from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import BoolInput
from axiestudio.io import DropdownInput, FileInput, MessageTextInput, MultilineInput, Output
from axiestudio.memory import store_message
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"
    name = "ChatInput"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",
            value="",
            info="Message to be passed as input.",
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="should_store_message",
            display_name="Store Messages",
            info="Store the message in the history.",
            value=True,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="sender",
            display_name="Sender Type",
            options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER],
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_USER,
            info="Type of sender.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="sender_name",
            display_name="Sender Name",
            info="Name of the sender.",
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session_id",
            display_name="Session ID",
            info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.",
            advanced=True,

        FileInput(
            name="files",
            display_name="Files",
            file_types=TEXT_FILE_TYPES + IMG_FILE_TYPES,
            info="Files to be sent with the message.",
            advanced=True,
            is_list=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response"),
    ]

    def message_response(self) -> Message:
        message = Message(
            text=self.input_value,
            sender=self.sender,

        if (
            self.session_id
            and isinstance(message, Message)
            and isinstance(message.text, str)
            and self.should_store_message
        ):
            store_message(
                message,
                flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
            )
            self.message.value = message

        self.status = message
        return message
